title: Slang
description: Neil and Alice discuss the differences between slang, jargon, and swearing, while teaching you some Cockney Rhyming Slang

vocabItems.definition: informal language spoken by a particular group
a coded language invented in the 19th Century by Cockneys (people who were born in a particular area of London) so they could speak in front of the police without being understood
booze alcoholswear words / profanity rude language that offends or upsets people
the technical language belonging to a specific subject area
